metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue - the conversation you can have with Shadowheart at any time when she's a member of your party. You can ask her about herself, or events that you've experienced together during your adventures. Her responses to you may differ slightly depending on her current attitude towards you.

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: Yes, it's crossed my mind since, more than once. Although...
64.context: NodeContext: A little trepidation. Something's on her mind (she's having doubts if a past romantic encounter with the player was a good idea)

35.speaker: Shadowheart
35.text: Well... since then, there's been a few occasions where you've given me doubts. Said things, or done things...
35.context: NodeContext: Vulnerable rather than harshly critical of the player

97.speaker: Shadowheart
97.text: Made me wonder if perhaps we're just too different. If we should just let things lie.

152.speaker: Shadowheart
152.text: It's not like I've been keeping a list of charges to throw at you. There's just... moments.
152.context: NodeContext: Trying to articulate the source of her doubts about the player

79.speaker: Shadowheart
79.text: It might sound harsh, but we're desperate, thrown together by fate. We both might want to see things that aren't truly there.
79.context: NodeContext: 'Maybe this isn't meant to be'

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Maybe I can still prove otherwise to you.

22.speaker: Shadowheart
22.text: Don't. We can't pretend to be someone we're not - either of us. It'll just end badly.
22.context: NodeContext: Genuine, She doesn't want the player to change who they are just to try satisfy her (and vice versa)

52.speaker: Shadowheart
52.text: Let's just... take things in as they come.
52.context: NodeContext: Open-ended. Maybe the relationship will survive, or not.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: I am who I am. Accept it, or don't.

120.speaker: Shadowheart
120.text: You're right. But I am who I am as well. At least I think so.
120.context: NodeContext: 'At least I think so' = reference to her missing memories. Quick bit of wry self-awareness

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Perhaps we'll get the chance to pick up where we left off.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I think maybe we should consider it a one-time affair.

28.speaker: Shadowheart
28.text: I see... perhaps it's for the best.
28.context: NodeContext: She'd been having her own doubts about their relationship

114.speaker: Shadowheart
114.text: Upset...? Of course not. I know a passing distraction when I see one.
114.context: NodeContext: She is a bit upset, but trying to put on a tough exterior

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I hope we can still be friends. I think we'll both need as many as we can get.

77.speaker: Shadowheart
77.text: Friends can't keep each other warm at night. But yes. it's good that we have each other...

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: Please, don't remind me. A mistake I'll try to avoid in future.
49.context: NodeContext: Displeased (the player has dropped in her estimations somehow since their romance encounter)

42.speaker: Shadowheart
42.context: NodeContext: Betraying a little nervousness (soon after her and the player had their first kiss, and their status going forward is not yet known)

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Of course. Unless something's the matter?

21.speaker: Shadowheart
21.text: No. I just wanted to see how you felt, after the night we spent together. When we talked...
21.context: NodeContext: A little nervous (soon after her and the player had their first kiss, and their status going forward is not yet known)

53.speaker: Player
53.text: That night meant a lot to me. And I hope there's more to come.

145.speaker: Shadowheart
145.text: I hope so too... though I'm not sure what kind of courtship we'll be afforded, given all that we're facing.

69.speaker: Shadowheart
69.text: But if you want to see where this goes, I do as well.
69.context: NodeContext: tentative/hopeful. Start of a more formal courtship

132.speaker: Player
132.text: I should have kissed you. That night meant a lot to me. I hope there's more to come.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: I should have kissed you. That night meant a lot to me. I hope there's more to come.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I would have in a heartbeat if I could've done it without hurting you.

146.speaker: Shadowheart
146.text: I would have liked that very much. A strange courtship we've started, isn't it.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Perhaps we got carried away. I value your company... but not like that.

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: Oh... I see. Well in that case, I suppose there's nothing more to be said on the matter.

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: Thank you, anyway. For your company.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: It was a mistake. We should forget it ever happened.

99.speaker: Shadowheart
99.text: It didn't feel like a mistake to me. Far from it. But I'll respect your wishes - consider it forgotten. I'm adept at that.

101.speaker: Shadowheart
101.text: I wondered if you'd have kissed me, if you could.

137.speaker: Shadowheart
137.text: I thought you were going to kiss me. I was almost sure of it.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I wanted to talk to you about that night we spent together.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: I was going to say the very same thing... as soon as I worked up my courage a little.
43.context: NodeContext: A little nervous (soon after her and the player had their first kiss, and their status going forward is not yet known)

85.speaker: Shadowheart
85.text: I can't recall the last time I shared so much with someone - maybe I never did before. It meant a lot to me. You mean a lot to me.
85.context: NodeContext: Sincere/a little nervous (soon after her and the player had their first kiss, and their status going forward is not yet known)

144.speaker: Shadowheart
144.text: I wondered if you'd have kissed me, if you could. It was on my mind all night.

106.speaker: Shadowheart
106.text: And that was before the kiss...

80.speaker: Shadowheart
80.text: I thought you were going to kiss me. I wanted you to kiss me.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Don't worry - I think I must have been misjudging you. I can't even remember what it was that made me say that...
2.context: NodeContext: Sincere. SH had previously expressed doubts about a budding romantic relationship with the player, but they've since returned to good standing - doubts gone.

98.speaker: Shadowheart
98.text: Too many to list. But the fact that you can't figure it out for yourself is very telling.
98.context: NodeContext: Cold. The player's sank so low in SH's estimations that she won't even bother trying to explain what they did to upset her.

110.speaker: Shadowheart
110.text: Something the matter? I should hope not, after the time we spent together. My spirits are... thoroughly lifted.
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Slight smile before 'thoroughly lifted'NodeContext: Warm, flirtatious. Slight smile before 'thoroughly lifted'

147.speaker: Player
147.text: I did want to talk to you about that, as it so happens...

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: Oh? Not feeling any regrets, I hope?

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Not in the slightest. It was wonderful.

60.speaker: Shadowheart
60.text: I'm glad. I feel the same way.

34.speaker: Shadowheart
34.text: Though I'm still finding sand in my hair - I wonder what the others will think of that...

71.speaker: Player
71.text: Let them think whatever they like. It doesn't matter.

26.speaker: Shadowheart
26.text: I suppose it doesn't. I'm glad we have each other. And I hope we'll have more opportunities to slip away.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: They will naturally assume we snuck away to make sand castles in the middle of the night.

7.speaker: Shadowheart
7.text: But of course they will. I hope we'll have more opportunities to slip away... and make sand castles.
7.context: NodeContext: Gentle laugh at the start

126.speaker: Player
126.text: Just remember - you'll need plenty of practice if you're to become an accomplished swimmer.

143.speaker: Shadowheart
143.text: Trust me - I'll be an eager pupil, if I have a thorough teacher.
143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Knowing smileNodeContext: Knowing smile

94.speaker: Shadowheart
94.text: 'We'll see'? I didn't think anything was left unseen after that night. Even if you have reservations, I enjoyed myself very much.
94.context: NodeContext: Miffed at the start, before calming.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I was just teasing. I had a wonderful time as well.

92.speaker: Shadowheart
92.context: NodeContext: teasing/snarky. Throwing the player's own words back at them

32.speaker: Player
32.text: I think it might have been a mistake.

148.speaker: Player
148.text: Actually... yes. I'm not sure we should do that again.

123.speaker: Shadowheart
123.text: Oh. I'm sorry you feel that way... I don't.

108.speaker: Shadowheart
108.text: Thank you, all the same. You helped me to put some things behind me. I'm... lighter, because of you.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: There'll be time to discuss that later - there was something else I wanted to speak to you about.

112.speaker: Shadowheart
112.text: May Lady Shar's blessings be upon you.

83.speaker: Shadowheart
83.text: Though I have little doubt she is most pleased, after the offering we made together. I know I certainly was...
83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sly smileNodeContext: Sly, knowing

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.text: Yes? Do you have notes for me?

88.speaker: Player
88.text: You ruined me. How can I ever lay with another after you?

102.speaker: Shadowheart
102.text: You flatter me. Perhaps I'll have the chance to reach your heights some time, whenever Lady Shar requires another offering...

149.speaker: Player
149.text: I loved it. I love you.

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: Oh. I'd hoped for a little more enthusiasm. Next time, perhaps. The Nightsinger always needs more offerings...

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Are all Nightfall rituals like that?

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.text: Not always. Some enclaves are content to sacrifice a goat and toast Lady Shar afterwards, but this time was a special occasion. I thought we'd better pull out all the stops.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: It was a mistake. I feel... unclean.

127.speaker: Shadowheart
127.text: Unclean is the ambition. Don't waste your time on guilt - I don't.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: You're right. I loved it. I may love you.

58.speaker: Shadowheart
58.text: Let's not get ahead of ourselves. I belong to Lady Shar - don't waste your time coveting what you can never truly have.

109.speaker: Shadowheart
109.text: Which isn't to say we needn't have any use for each other, from time to time...

113.speaker: Shadowheart
113.text: I do. Don't worry. It gets easier and easier, the further you venture into the darkness.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Are you sure? All you've done, those sacrifices you made... seems there's plenty to be guilty about.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: That's gone. The Lady of Loss took those burdens from me. Now I serve. Embrace who I am, or don't. It won't change a thing.

118.speaker: Shadowheart
118.text: Just remember that you helped me reach my potential. What you see before you are the fruits of your labours.

48.speaker: Shadowheart
48.text: Oh. Your loss, trust me. I'm sure there will be plenty who'll help me honour the Dark Lady.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: What does this mean for us?

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: Nothing. I belong to Lady Shar - don't waste your time coveting what you can never truly have.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I dishonoured Selûne... I debased myself.

142.speaker: Shadowheart
142.text: You certainly did. It was spectacular.
142.context: NodeContext: The cat who got the cream. Husky whisper for second sentence.

51.speaker: Shadowheart
51.text: Don't worry. It gets easier and easier, the further you venture into the darkness.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: There'll be time to discuss that later - there was something else I wanted to speak to you about.

117.speaker: Shadowheart
117.text: I think I know what you mean. There's an undeniable rapport, and yet we haven't made time for each other. Time alone.

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: Easily remedied, if you like. I know a place.

5.speaker: Shadowheart
5.text: Well, perhaps easy isn't quite the right word - we'll have to retrace our steps back out of the Shadow Curse. I'd like to get to know you better without worrying about hazardous surroundings, if it's all the same.
5.context: NodeContext: 'Actually, there's a little snag we have to handle before we can explore romance'

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I'm willing to make a detour. Where to - the wilderness we passed through before?

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: That should do nicely. It'll be worth the trek back, I promise. We can go in your own time, but let's be careful advance too far forwards. I'd hate for us to miss our chance because events took a turn.
15.context: NodeContext: Keen/slightly apologetic for complicating things (it's not her fault, but a quirk of the game that her wine romance scene can only take place in certain regions)

50.speaker: Player
50.text: I'd like that. Just lead the way.

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: Not just yet - let's choose our moment. Some quiet night, when the others are asleep and there's no distractions, I'll come for you.

125.speaker: Shadowheart
125.text: Did I? Don't worry - I was probably just too busy drinking in the sight of you.
125.context: NodeContext: Playful/sincere (the player improved their standing in SH's eyes since that moment of hesitation, so she no longer wishes to express any doubts)

135.speaker: Player
135.text: I'm glad to hear it. I haven't been able to stop thinking about that night we shared.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Perhaps you were right to hesitate. I'm not sure there's a future for you and I.

150.speaker: Shadowheart
150.text: Oh... if that's how you feel about it, fine. Not every sapling is destined to grow tall, I suppose.

38.speaker: Shadowheart
38.text: I hesitated? Probably because I was coming to realise what a poor match we are for each other.
38.context: NodeContext: The player's sank low enough in SH's estimations for her to dismiss their previous romance as a mistake,

56.speaker: Shadowheart
56.text: Let's just forget that little encounter ever happened, shall we?
56.context: NodeContext: 'You and me that time? Never happened'

11.speaker: Shadowheart
11.text: Hmm, yes. I would have been better off getting some rest I think. Let's leave it at that.
11.context: NodeContext: Displeased (the player has dropped in her estimations somehow since their romance encounter)
